characters.name: Adam
characters.description: The first man, created by God from dust

characters.name: Eve
characters.description: The first woman, created from Adam's rib

characters.name: Noah
characters.description: Righteous man who built the ark and survived the flood

characters.name: Abraham
characters.description: Father of faith and the Hebrew nation

characters.name: Sarah
characters.description: Wife of Abraham, mother of Isaac in old age

characters.name: Isaac
characters.description: Son of promise, second patriarch

characters.name: Jacob/Israel
characters.description: Third patriarch, renamed Israel after wrestling with God

characters.name: Joseph
characters.description: Dreamer sold into slavery who became Egypt's second-in-command

characters.name: Moses
characters.description: Deliverer of Israel, lawgiver, greatest OT prophet

characters.name: Aaron
characters.description: Moses' brother, first high priest of Israel

characters.name: Miriam
characters.description: Prophetess, sister of Moses and Aaron

characters.name: Joshua
characters.description: Moses' successor who led Israel into the Promised Land

characters.name: Rahab
characters.description: Canaanite woman who helped Israelite spies

characters.name: Deborah
characters.description: Prophetess and judge who led Israel to victory

characters.name: Gideon
characters.description: Judge who defeated Midian with 300 men

characters.name: Samson
characters.description: Judge with supernatural strength, betrayed by Delilah

characters.name: Ruth
characters.description: Moabite woman, ancestor of David and Jesus

characters.name: Samuel
characters.description: Prophet and judge who anointed Israel's first kings

characters.name: Saul
characters.description: First king of Israel, rejected for disobedience

characters.name: David
characters.description: Shepherd king, man after God's own heart, ancestor of Jesus

characters.name: Solomon
characters.description: Wisest king, temple builder, author of Proverbs

characters.name: Elijah
characters.description: Fiery prophet who confronted Baal worship

characters.name: Elisha
characters.description: Prophet who succeeded Elijah with double portion

characters.name: Isaiah
characters.description: Major prophet of Judah, messianic prophecies

characters.name: Jeremiah
characters.description: Weeping prophet who warned of Jerusalem's fall

characters.name: Ezekiel
characters.description: Prophet of visions among the exiles

characters.name: Daniel
characters.description: Prophet in exile, interpreter of dreams

characters.name: Jonah
characters.description: Reluctant prophet swallowed by a great fish

characters.name: Esther
characters.description: Jewish queen who saved her people in Persia

characters.name: Job
characters.description: Righteous man tested through extreme suffering

characters.name: Mary (Mother of Jesus)
characters.description: Virgin mother of Jesus, favored by God

characters.name: Joseph (Husband of Mary)
characters.description: Earthly father of Jesus, righteous carpenter

characters.name: John the Baptist
characters.description: Forerunner of Jesus, baptizer in the wilderness

characters.name: Jesus Christ
characters.description: Son of God, Savior of the world, central figure of Scripture

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: Fisherman apostle, leader of the early church

characters.name: James (Son of Zebedee)

characters.name: John (Apostle)
characters.description: Beloved disciple, author of Gospel, letters, and Revelation

characters.name: Matthew
characters.description: Tax collector turned apostle, Gospel author

characters.name: Judas Iscariot
characters.description: Apostle who betrayed Jesus

characters.name: Mary Magdalene
characters.description: Devoted follower of Jesus, first witness to resurrection

characters.name: Martha
characters.description: Friend of Jesus, sister of Mary and Lazarus

characters.name: Lazarus
characters.description: Friend of Jesus raised from the dead

characters.name: Paul/Saul
characters.description: Apostle to the Gentiles, author of epistles

characters.name: Barnabas
characters.description: Encourager, companion of Paul

characters.name: Timothy
characters.description: Young pastor, Paul's spiritual son

characters.name: Luke
characters.description: Physician, Gospel and Acts author, Paul's companion

characters.name: Stephen
characters.description: First Christian martyr

characters.name: Philip (Evangelist)
characters.description: Deacon and evangelist

characters.name: Cornelius
characters.description: Roman centurion, first Gentile convert

characters.name: Priscilla and Aquila
characters.description: Husband-wife ministry team with Paul
